description:
Tommy and the guys get together to watch the Migratory Bird Cop special. In the show, Tommy is a police academy student fervently trying to follow in the footsteps of the detective he idolizes. Can he find a way to help Detective Rock?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Migratory Bird Cop Special: Police Academy on the Shore Side Story
Wataridori Cup SP: Suihen no Keisatsugakkou Bangai Hen
渡り鳥コップSP ~水辺の警察学校番外編~
